item.description: I am a second year Masters student at CMU. I am advised by Professor Alexander Hauptmann and Robert Frederking. I have a broad research interset spanning all three modalities, i.e. vision, languague and speech. My current research focus is on improving cross-modal retrieval and languague grounding. Additionally, I am trying to apply graph based neural networks to various NLP tasks. Previously, I spent three years (2014-17) in the Advanced Research Lab at Samsung Research, Bangalore.
